channel.title: [PI]Need help fixing MTP drops please
channel.description: my npcdrops.tsm file is correct but i still cant get my npcs to drop? I thought that maybe somehow drops got turned off but there is no commands for that no idea whats going on,,it was a pk based server but i added npcs and drops but cant get em to drop.any advice would be appreciated here,,ty It is MTP from what i understand there is something screwy going on with MTP can anyone help me with a fix please? How can i add a npc drop system and where do i add it?
